arm_group.description: 10 cmH2O PEEP added to the respiratory curcuit during suspension of mechanical ventilation
0 cmH2O PEEP added to the respiratory curcuit during suspension of mechanical ventilation

brief_summary.textblock:
For some upper ureteral and renal stones,ureteroscopic lithotripsy needs to be performed
      under general anesthesia with interrupted suspension of mechanical ventilation, which could
      result in hypercapnia and hypoxia. In this study, the investigators hypothesize that 10
      cmH2O PEEP added to the respiratory circuit with 1 L/min 100% oxygen might extend the time
      of ventilation suspension but have no effect on carbon dioxide retention in blood.

clinical_study.brief_title: Suspension of Mechanical Ventilation in Ureteroscopic Lithotripsy Under General Anesthesia

detailed_description.textblock:
For some upper ureteral and renal stones,ureteroscopic lithotripsy is often perdurbed by the
      patient's respiratory movement either under epidural anesthesia or general anesthesia with
      mechanical ventilation. So intermittent suspension of mechanical ventilation under general
      anesthesia can ensure the surgery to be performed continuously and successfully. But this
      could result in hypercapnia and hypoxia. So far, there have been few studies focused on the
       change of the internal environment in blood as result of suspending breath. In this study,
      the investigators hypothesize that 10 cmH2O PEEP added to the respiratory circuit with 1
      L/min 100% oxygen might extend the time of ventilation suspension but have no effect on
      carbon dioxide retention in blood.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        ASA I~III general anesthesia sign the informed consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

        ASA IV or V woman who is pregnant or plans to bear

intervention.description: PEEP means that when mechanical ventilation is suspended, the value of expiratory valve in the anesthesia machine is set at 10 cmH2O with 1 L/min 100% oxygen.

other_outcome.description: We record the duration of the operation
other_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the surgery to the end of the surgery

other_outcome.description: We record how long it will take for the patients to act accoreding to our order after ceasing anesthesia.
other_outcome.time_frame: from the end of anesthesia to  return of consciousness

other_outcome.description: We will record if patinets have any memory during the operative, namely intraoperatiove awareness.
other_outcome.time_frame: from the initiation of anesthesia to the end of the surgery

primary_outcome.description: we chose different time points to mesure the changes in blood gas.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline before suspension of ventilation,  5 min after suspension, 10 min after suspension, 15 min after suspension, 5 min after re-ventilaiton, 10 min after re-ventilation

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_title: Department of Anesthesiology , Changhai Hospital Affiliated to Second Military Medical

secondary_outcome.description: we chose different time points to mesure the changes in systolic blood pressure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline before suspension of ventilation,  5 min after suspension, 10 min after suspension, 15 min after suspension, 5 min after re-ventilaiton, 10 min after re-ventilation
